pr_title: Make KafkaTopicPartitionStatsResponse a Kafka connector utility method

timeline.message:
Move reduce method for KafkaTopicPartitionResponse to DiagnosticsAware

All the connectors KMM, Espresso and Oracle have common implemetations
of reduce methos for KafkaTopicPartitionResponse. Hence, moving it to the
DiagnosticsAware interface to eliminate duplciate code.

Move reduce method for KafkaTopicPartitionResponse to DiagnosticsAware

All the connectors KMM, Espresso and Oracle have common implemetations
of reduce methos for KafkaTopicPartitionResponse. Hence, moving it to the
DiagnosticsAware interface to eliminate duplciate code.

timeline.bodyText: You might want to consider passing a logger to this method, or to a KafkaConnectorUtils  ctor. This way, log statements printed by this method would have the appropriate connector/task type name instead of KafkaConnectorUtils.
timeline.author: ahmedahamid

timeline.bodyText: Would it be a good idea to rename this to KafkaConnectorDiagUtils to make it a little more specific?
timeline.author: ahmedahamid
